examples.text: Herkes, her an müthiş bir tehlikeye maruzdur.
examples.translation: Everyone, at all times, is subject to an awesome risk.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish معروض (“maruz”), from Arabic مَعْرُوض (maʕrūḍ), passive participle of عَرَضَ (ʕaraḍa, “to appear, happen, show”). Compare Azerbaijani məruz.
